name: Luna Quest
description:
This game is a product of me (no prior programming / game dev experience) taking 3 days on learning C# and making a very simple RPG with it.

If you like seeing spaghetti, the code is here: u.smutty.horse/mfklfaorkcz.cs

Synopsis: (You), a noble knight called Anon Y Mousse is on a heroic quest to save Princess Luna from the evil sorcerer Haber.
